name: Midtown Courthouse Banks
description: Marble banks and ledges around Midtown courthouses. Classic spot but heavy security.
history: Featured in many NYC skate videos. Security crackdowns have made sessions rare.
bestTimes: Very early mornings or late nights only.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include banks, ledges, flat ground, stairs. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Midtown East. Featured in many NYC skate videos. Security crackdowns have made sessions rare.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 4/5/6/7/S to Grand Central.. Very early mornings or late nights only.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot â€” be respectful of the space and watch for security.
